ch.nolix.element.GUI

Class WidgetLook<WL extends WidgetLook<WL>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.entity2.Entity<WL>
      • ch.nolix.element.GUI.WidgetLook<WL>
  • Type Parameters:
    WL - The type of a WidgetLook.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Castable, IFluentObject<WL>, ISmartObject<WL>, Listable<WL>, TypeRequestable, Resettable<WL>, Specifiable<WL>, Specified
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AreaLook, BackgroundWidgetLook, LineLook

    public abstract class WidgetLook<WL extends WidgetLook<WL>>
extends Entity<WL>
    A WidgetLook stores the state-dependent attributes of a Widget. For each attribute A, a WidgetLook provides, a WidgetLook has a method getRecursiveOrDefaultA(). Step 1: If the WidgetLook has a value for A, getRecursiveOrDefaultA() must return thevalue. Step 2: If the WidgetLook has a base look, getRecursiveOrDefaultA() must return getRecursiveOrDefaultA() of the base structure. Step 3: getRecursiveOrDefaultA() must return the default value for A.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
